meanings.sent1: The unmoulded clay felt soft and undefined.
meanings.sent2: The artist preferred the unmoulded look for the sculpture.
meanings.sent3: The unmoulded cookie dough was a shapeless blob on the baking sheet.
meanings.sent4: Her unmoulded ideas needed structure to become a coherent plan.
meanings.sent5: The unmoulded snowball melted into a puddle in the sun.

meanings.definition: Not removed from a mold or container
meanings.sent1: The unmoulded gelatin stayed in the bowl.
meanings.sent2: The unmoulded soap retained the shape of its container.
meanings.sent3: The unmoulded jello wiggled in the mold, refusing to come out.
meanings.sent4: His unmoulded thoughts were trapped in a rigid mindset.
meanings.sent5: The unmoulded ice cubes clinked in the glass, still in the tray.
